gameData.contentHtml: Sushi Go Party! expands Sushi Go! with a party platter of mega maki, super sashimi, and endless edamame. You still earn points by picking winning sushi combos, but now you can customize each game by choosing Ã  la carte from a menu of more than twenty delectable dishes. What's more, up to eight players can join in on the sushi-feast. Let the good times roll!
gameData.title: Sushi Go
gameData.lead: Pass sushi around a bigger table and take the best dishes. Save room for dessert!
